description: Developed for both racing and recreational skiing, this hard kickwax works best on new snow, or older snow that hasn't risen above 0°C.Contains 45g.V05 Polar. Fresh snow:-12 to -25°C. Old snow: -15 to -30°C.V20 Green. Fresh snow: -8 to -15°C. Old snow: -10 to -18°C.V30 Blue. Fresh snow: -2 to -10°C. Old snow: -5 to -15°C.V40 Blue Extra. Fresh snow: -1 to -7°C. Old snow: -3 to -10°C.V45 Violet Special. Fresh snow: 0 to -3°C. Old snow: -2 to -6°C.V50 Violet. Fresh snow: 0°C. Old snow: -1 to -3°C.V55 Red Special. Fresh snow: +1 to 0°C. Old snow: 0 to -2°C.V60 Red/Silver. Fresh snow: +3 to 0°C. Old snow: +1 to -1°C.
name: Swix V-Line Wax
